WriteFile File Reference

#include <osg/Image>
#include <osg/Shape>
#include <osg/Node>

#include <osgDB/Registry>
#include <string>

Namespaces

namespace  osgDB
 

The osgDB library provides support for reading and writing scene graphs, providing a plugin framework and file utility classes.
